content.raw:
I am creating an issue for implementing the new features of the API such as specifying a port and filling the timestamp in hx_update. We can take care of that later, however.

edit: It looks Carlos implemented some of the changes, like host and port. They will require further testing, however.
content.html:
I am creating an issue for implementing the new features of the API such as specifying a port and filling the timestamp in hx_update. We can take care of that later, however.

edit: It looks Carlos implemented some of the changes, like host and port. They will require further testing, however.
